DOC.brief_title: The Various Effects Gaseous Albuterol Serum Lactate
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 30 healthy volunteer randomize Albuterol placebo . We power study detect difference 0.5 mmol/L , hypothesize difference great 1.0 mmol/L . All volunteer subject sign write consent , approve Institutional Review Board . The intended pool volunteer resident , attending , medical student hospital . The consent form clearly specify participation study impact academic status employment . The subject randomize Albuterol arm receive one hour 10 mg continuous Albuterol nebulizer treatment . Those randomized placebo receive one-hour saline nebulizer treatment . The chief pharmacist study randomly assign number one thirty fifteen Albuterol treatments fifteen placebo treatment . Subjects monitor cardiac monitor serum lactate level draw every 15 minute .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Pregnant Prisoner beta agonist allergy hypokalemia take furosemide , insulin , thiazide diuretic , metformin acetazolamide coronary artery disease hyperthyroidism abnormal heart rhythm baseline serum lactate level > 2.2 mmol/L baseline heart rate > 120
